## Connect Casino Road Video

This presentation included a short video that showcased several Casino Road community members and their perspectives on the changes that the light rail station might bring. This video was produced by [Connect Casino Road](https://www.connectcasinoroad.org/), with policy expertise and strategic guidance provided by Tiernan Martin from [Futurewise](https://futurewise.org/).
